data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Nebraska.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nebraska, United States
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Nebraska, United States need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 510,326 believers in the state of Nebraska to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Nebraska.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jat (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nebraska. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 510,326 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,422,274 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 510,326 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Nebraska.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Nebraska
location.cities_list: Omaha, Lincoln, Sioux City, Bellevue, Grand Island
location.cities_list_w_pop: Omaha (486,051), Lincoln (277,348), Sioux City (82,821), Bellevue (55,510), Grand Island (51,440)
